Header.title: Repurpose the life purpose.
Header.paragraph: Need to get rid of leftover materials? Do not ever poluate the our planet ever again - others can repurpose what you don't need anymore!

Services.name: Plastic
Services.text: Got kilos of plastic waste at home? 50 plastic bags, bottles and containers? Connect with businesses that recycle your plastic to make shoes, trendy leggings, sweaters, comforters, backpacks and so much more. Ensure that your plastic never reaches the oceans again!

Services.name: Cardboard
Services.text: Got that mile high pile of Amazon Boxes at home?. Connect with businesses that upcycle your cardboard waste to new, unique products! Track whether your waste become a new chair, photo frame and so much more.

Services.name: Food Waste
Services.text: Connect with businesses that that turn your food waste into sustainable bio-fuel, bio-based plastic and so on. Receive statistics on your own carbon footprint, track the end result of your waste and ensure that it never reaches landfills again!
